content.raw:
I’ll go ahead and remove them in this PR then.  I think we should also remove:

* The development screenshots/GIMP file in robotx\_gazebo/models/sandisland \(besides the actual heightmap\)
* robotx\_gazebo/test \(We should add proper tests later, but these seem to just be development work\)
* The .blend files for the buoys \(blender can work directly with .dae, which is what is used in the model\)

‌
content.html:
I’ll go ahead and remove them in this PR then. I think we should also remove:

  • The development screenshots/GIMP file in robotx_gazebo/models/sandisland (besides the actual heightmap)
  • robotx_gazebo/test (We should add proper tests later, but these seem to just be development work)
  • The .blend files for the buoys (blender can work directly with .dae, which is what is used in the model)
